name: surgeryEncounter
title: Surgery Encounter
description: Represents the encounter for the surgery

feature.name: endTime
feature.title: Encounter end time
feature.description: Encounter end time (Patient out of operation room)

feature.name: specialty
feature.title: Specialty of the performed surgery
feature.description: SNOMED-CT code for surgical specialty e.g. 394611003 -> Plastic surgery

feature.name: priority
feature.title: Priority of surgery
feature.description: SNOMED-CT code for surgical priority e.g. EL -> Elective surgery

feature.name: episodeId
feature.title: Episode of care identifier
feature.description: Unique identifier for the main episode (OperationEpisode) that this surgery takes place

feature.name: location
feature.title: Operating room
feature.description: Unique id of the operating room that this operation takes place

feature.name: surgeryPlanId
feature.title: Surgery plan identifier
feature.description: Id of the plan record that this surgery is based on

feature.name: duration
feature.title: Duration in operation room
feature.description: Duration in minutes between entry and exit to/from the operation room
